document.full_text: the united states became the first nation to block produce from japan's radiation zone, saying on wednesday it will halt milk, vegetable and fruit imports from areas near the tsunami-damaged nuclear plant because of contamination fears.
document.title: what are restrictions on japanese food imports?
lines_and_colors: the united states became the first nation to block produce from japan's radiation zone, saying on wednesday it will halt milk, vegetable and fruit imports from areas near the tsunami-damaged nuclear plant because of contamination fears.
